评论详情: The ACTIVE UNIFORMS Short Sleeve Coveralls are perfect for work. They’re comfortable, lightweight, and provide a great fit for all-day wear. The material feels durable, and the design allows for easy movement. Ideal for various tasks, these coveralls are both functional and stylish—definitely 5 stars!
Buy one size bigger. Maybe 2. Tight when you sit down.
Just as advertised.  Good quality, fast delivery.

My favorite thing is the very sturdy 2 way zipper, so you can also unzip from the bottom for a guy to go...My least favorite thing is that the fabric has 0 stretch.  1-2% spandex would make these 5 star.  To squat and pick something up, I have to pull the legs up a bit firstI also wish the fabric was bleach proof.  Otherwise, the fabric quality is excellent, and I like the weight of the it....unlike some reviewers who say it is thin.  I work inside, so heavier fabric would be too hot and be even less flexible.I"m 5'11, 185, and Medium  is perfect

Dad is 5’10,  175 lbs and wears a large comfortably. Material is on the thin side. He can get into and out of them easily. He has cancer and these are easy for him to wear and get on and off. Bought another pair.
5 '7" 180 lbs. broad shoulder, crotch killer when raising both hands.

My husband is retired, but not from life. He finds these the most comfortable and coolest outfits to wear, whether on the tractor or up a ladder. Room to move around in and no belts, suspenders, or other things to bind. Plenty of pockets, though he'd have liked the front pockets deeper. All in all, very happy with a well-made outfit.
Bought these for my son. He’s 6’4 and about 245#, so I purchased 3X. Experience has taught me that you need plenty of room in these, especially in the summer. He really likes them.
This coveralls are light and comfortable for doing yard work.  Sizing chart waist measurement did run a little off and had to exchange the XL for L.

I guess it depends on what type of work. You can see through them if you hold them up to interior lights, very thin. I work in the shipyard they DO NOT compare to dickie or carhartt definitely won’t keep you warm but they stylish if say for costume or light dirty work. A snag and they’re done
Thinner material than popular brands, but fitting for the price in my opinion.
Size chart...  perfect sizing

The quality of this garment is beyond reproach. I encourage prospective buyers to pay especially close attention to the size chart. I suggest that if you are very, very close to the next larger size, order the larger size. Here is why:  I was very close to the line between medium and large. I ordered the medium size. When the garment arrived I immediately tried it on (without a shirt under it). I noticed when I took it off it was a little hard to remove, but It didn’t raise any particular concern.  The next day I put it back on, this time with a T-shirt underneath. At the end of the day when it was time to undress for bed,I discovered that it was virtually impossible to extricate my self from the garment (due to the extra bulk of the T-shirt). After more than 45 minutes of unsuccessful struggle, I made  the difficult decision to resort to scissors (I had no one living with me who could have helped me).Despite all this I was impressed enough with the quality of the garment that I have ordered another in the larger size.
Very comfortable and stylish

评论概述: Thin fabric but, Poly so it's hot.

These coveralls are sturdy and the edges are sergered together well so it holds up even when you tug on the inseams.
I like it. And help keep me clean

Used this coverall for a Halloween costume as a zoo keeper. It was very comfortable and came packaged quickly. Wish I could work in this everyday.
